ygData.subject: Re: Testament of Vanear - SPOILER!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The Testament is off hand only and the paw can be held in either.  I normally carry paw in main hand, testament in off hand but have three hotkey slots set
ygData.messageBody:
Curtis Bennett wrote:
>
> From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
>
> I got my testament of Vanear last night. And what Martyn Adams says
> is entirely true (I admit, I was a bit skeptical at first.) I am
> going to post this information to gamestats today. You need not go to
> Erudia at all to get this. Indeed, just give Moodoro Finharn 2gp and
> he will give you the book. Then give him the 4gp and he will start
> giving you playing cards....
>
> Stats are +10 wis, +10 mana.
> I think it's off-hand held only. But I do know the Paw of Opolla(sp)
> can be held in either hand. And some brave clerics hold both for a
> truly intense increase in wisdom.
>

The Testament is off hand only and the paw can be held in either. I
normally carry paw in main hand, testament in off hand but have three
hotkey slots set up (one for main hand, one for off hand, one for first
inventory slot) so I can click on my weapon, click on paw, click on
testament click on inventory slot to change to holding a weapon quickly.
Not that I solo that often but sometimes you do just need a weapon to
finish something off.

Vinamin
Son of Innoruuk
Priest of The Lady
Erollisi Marr
